text.div:
Specimen Container Type

Checks on the patient prior specimen collection. All SNOMED CT concepts descendants of 706041008 |Device for body fluid and tissue collection/transfer/processing (physical object)|

Implementers of these specifications must have the appropriate SNOMED CT Affiliate license - for more information contact http://www.snomed.org/snomed-ct/get-snomed-ct or info@snomed.org

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 706041008 (Device for body fluid and tissue collection/transfer/processing)
